__TOC__

In Maverick QtWebkit has been split off the Qt package. As a result libqt4-dev no longer contains the necessary files for QtWebkit so every package that needs them has to build-depend on libqtwebkit-dev.

The following table contains all source packages which don't build-depend on kdelibs5-dev and have a binary package that depends on libqtwebkit4. This should cover most packages that fail because of the split but may of course contain false-positives.
